headline: Reset Is Not Deprivation—It’s Recovery
body: When your brain rests, it resets. When it resets, it sees clearly. Recovery is clarity.
prompt: What overstimulating habit could you pause this week to give your brain a clearer baseline?

headline: Not Just Pleasure—Power
body: Dopamine is about drive, not just delight. Understand it, and you understand your urges.
prompt: Where in your life are you chasing dopamine spikes—and where could you build healthier baselines?
